title: Blossom Diamond Haaram: A Symphony of Sparkle
materials: Brilliant Cut Diamonds (0.77 Carat Diamond Weight). Features a stunning array of marquise and pear-shaped diamonds in varying sizes
meticulously set for maximum brilliance. Diamond Clarity: SI. Diamond Color: GH.
features: This exquisite two-strand Haaram features a repeating floral motif, each blossom delicately crafted with marquise and pear-shaped diamonds radiating from a central cluster. The design incorporates both symmetrical and asymmetrical arrangements, creating a dynamic yet harmonious aesthetic. A subtle 'Hyderabadi Polish' enhances the brilliance of the white gold setting. Each flower has pear-shaped diamond leaves dangling. The use of various diamond shapes is a modern interpretation of traditional Telugu jewelry design.
colors: with the bright white gold providing a lustrous backdrop for the dazzling diamonds.
occasions: Perfect for grand celebrations like weddings (Vivah)
and upscale social gatherings. Its contemporary design also makes it suitable for modern cocktail parties and formal events
adding a touch of timeless elegance to any ensemble. Ideal for the modern Telugu bride.
description: This Diamond Haaram is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless design. The brilliant-cut diamonds, meticulously set in white gold, create a breathtaking display of sparkle. A versatile piece that blends tradition with modern sensibilities, this haaram will be a cherished heirloom for generations to come. Its lightweight design ensures comfortable wear, making it ideal for extended celebrations.
